body_content.explanation: in a way that is very special or famous and therefore likely to be remembered for a long time:
examples: She is the Oscar-nominated actress who immortally created these roles on stage.
The novel is one of the most immortally funny works of English literature.

body_content.explanation: in a way that will live or last forever:
examples: Even in death the vampires are immortally wedded, as they knew that they would be.
He asked whether people believe they will live immortally.
